info.author: Brandon R. Stoner
info.description:
# django edict
#### Brandon R. Stoner <monokrome@monokro.me>

## What is this?

A django application for posting news. This is a fairly decent *news or
blogging* application, and easily provides features like comments, markup,
and RSS and ATOM feeds at no cost. However it makes no assumptions regarding
your design, and therefore doesn't include any WYSIWYG/WYSIWYM editors or
anything like that. You can easily add your own by simply applying it to
<textarea> elements with a 'text-edit' class. This application also ties into
the django user authentication system to allow multiple users to post, edit,
and delete news articles on the web site.
info.name: django-edict
info.summary: A django application for keeping your fans up to date.
info.html_description:
# django edict #### Brandon R. Stoner <monokrome@monokro.me>

## What is this?

A django application for posting news. This is a fairly decent news or blogging application, and easily provides features like comments, markup, and RSS and ATOM feeds at no cost. However it makes no assumptions regarding your design, and therefore doesn’t include any WYSIWYG/WYSIWYM editors or anything like that. You can easily add your own by simply applying it to <textarea> elements with a ‘text-edit’ class. This application also ties into the django user authentication system to allow multiple users to post, edit, and delete news articles on the web site.
